body.name: MORENTO Air Purifiers for Home Large Room up to 1076 Sq Ft with PM 2.5 Display Air Quality Sensor, H13 True HEPA Filter Remove 99.97% of Pet Hair with Double-sided Air Inlet, 24db, White, 1 Pack
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 11 mins
features: Dual Side Air Intake: This air purifier for home large rooms is designed with dual air intakes. Compared to the single air inlet design, it performs purification work on both sides simultaneously, greatly improving the purification speed. Our air purifier for allergies CADR is up to 300 (m 3/ h) For a 1076 square foot/100 square meter room, it can refresh the air every hour, giving you a healthy and fresh breathing environment in smoke.

Authoritative Certification: Certified by 3rd party testing agency, MORENTO HY4866 hepa air purifier can effectively remove 99.97% of the air particles ranging from small to 0.3 microns, such as dust, smoke, pollen, hair, and odor. CARB, ETL, EPA and FCC certified. Turn on the high-efficiency air purifier, so that you can enjoy a new and comfortable air environment all the time.

PM 2.5 Display & Air Quality Sensor: The MORNETO HY4866 bedroom air purifier is equipped with an infrared PM2.5 sensor, which will monitor the air quality in real time and feed it back to the display screen. When the air purifier is in automatic mode, if the surrounding air becomes cloudy, the display screen will appear yellow or red, and the fan will speed up to clean the air faster, which is a best air purifier for wildfire smoke. Let you know the health of the air at any time.

Your Silent Partner: When the MORENTO HY4866 pet hair air purifier for bedroom is operating in sleep mode, our air purifier fan operates at low speed with low noise (less than 24dB), and all indicator lights are turned off. It will not interfere with your sweet sleep, allowing you and your family to enjoy fresh and clean air in sweet dreams. It is a quiet sleep partner worth investing in.

3 Timer & 4 Fan Speed: The hepa air purifiers for home for dust has 4 adjustable fan speeds, which are 1F/2F/3F/4F. You can select the Fan Speed according to the air quality. The higher the wind speed, the faster the purification speed. When you don't know which fan speed to choose , you can turn on automatic mode, it can help you choose the appropriate fan speed. You also can turn on the timer mode when you sleep or go out, which are 2/5/8H.

Multiple Filter Choices: Please replace with MORENTO air filter element every 4-6 months (up to the air quality in your area). B0BMDYDXFK: Enhanced Filter; B0C3GWNR29: Original Filter. You can search ASIN on Amazon to get replacement filters you want.

Ideal gift: MORENTO HY4866 hepa air purifiers for home is suitable for living rooms, bedrooms, apartments, offices, etc. Its exquisite design and efficient purification capacityis are very suitable for pet families, but also as a Christmas gift for friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Breath of Fresh Air!
reviews.reviewText: I can't express enough how thrilled I am with the MORENTO H13 True HEPA Air Purifier in Pearl White. This air purifier has been an absolute game-changer for my living space, and it has exceeded my expectations in every way.First and foremost, the design is sleek and modern, blending seamlessly into my decor. Its compact dimensions of 7.63"D x 13.18"W x 17.51"H make it a perfect fit for my room. The fact that it's CARB certified gives me peace of mind knowing it meets high environmental standards.One of the standout features is the dual-side air intake system. Unlike conventional air purifiers with a single air inlet, this one operates on both sides simultaneously. This innovation significantly boosts its purification speed, and with a remarkable CADR of 300 (m³/h), it's more than capable of refreshing the air in my spacious 1076 square foot room. This is particularly beneficial for creating a clean and healthy environment, especially in situations like dealing with pet odors or wildfire smoke.The high-efficiency filtration system is simply outstanding. It utilizes multi-layered filtration technology, featuring a H13 True HEPA filter, to remove 99.97% of air particles as small as 0.3 microns. This means that dust, smoke, pollen, pet hair, and odors are all effectively eliminated. With this air purifier, you can enjoy breathing fresh air continuously.The added bonus of a PM 2.5 display and air quality sensor provides real-time monitoring of the air quality in my room. This feature is particularly valuable in automatic mode, where the purifier adjusts its fan speed in response to changes in air quality. If the air quality deteriorates, the display screen turns yellow or red, signaling the need for faster purification. It's like having a personal air quality guardian.And when it comes to noise, this air purifier is truly a silent partner. In sleep mode, the fan operates at a barely audible level, generating less than 24dB of noise. All indicator lights are turned off, ensuring that it won't disturb your peaceful slumber. It's the ideal addition to any bedroom, providing clean and fresh air while you sleep.Additionally, the unit offers 4 fan speeds, so you can choose the level of purification power you need, or simply let the automatic mode handle it for you. It also features a timer function with 2, 5, and 8-hour options, which adds a convenient touch to the package.In summary, the MORENTO H13 True HEPA Air Purifier in Pearl White is a true gem. It not only looks great but delivers exceptional performance. It has turned my living space into a sanctuary of clean, fresh air, making it a must-have for anyone looking to improve their indoor air quality. You won't be disappointed with this investment, and, like me, you might wonder how you ever lived without it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working very well!
reviews.reviewText: I just set it up yesterday. So far so good! I like that it displays a number and a color to let you know what the air quality is. When I was sweeping near it the number went up since there was a little fine dirt/dust in the air near the unit. I like that it is rectangular and has two filters on both sides. I was happy to read that the filters can be cleaned with a vacuum when they get dirty. (I bought a replacement set of filters when I ordered this. Maybe I didn't need to do that.)It has several fan speeds and an automatic setting. It is fairly quiet. I am happy I bought this. I hope it helps collect some of the fine dirt particles that the dogs bring in the house. (I didn't rate the sleep mode or the timer because I haven't used them yet.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm happy with this. It immediately cleansed the stinky air, near the front door where my male kitty had sprayed and been unhappy before he was neutered. I thought I had to move to breathe clean air in my home, but I got this, and it immediately worked. By about two hours I no longer can smell any odor, and it is a delicate soft sound, easy to sleep to, and even comforting. I have not turned it off. I won't. I come home, unlock the door and take a deep breath in, Voila,clean air ! I'm actually HAPPY breathing indoors, and even before he sprayed the doorway carpet, I hated how stuffy my studio was. I bought plants, and they help, but I felt I was suffocating indoors. I leave two windows venting it still is difficult to breathe. But now I can. This product is exactly what you want. Totally affordable. You don't have to assemble it. You remove the plastic, and the little tray where the dinky filter coin goes, slides in and out really easily. Fun little push. The purifier is a life ,lung, sinus saver! I got one for my daughter and one for myself. I am a good mom now, she can sleep without headaches in the city, and all of the dust we used to choke on in our sleep?? Thing of the past. I honestly don't have a blocked airway when I wake up now. I have absolutely become healthier. YaY!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Product, Great Price!
reviews.reviewText: I have used many different air purifiers, and this one is one of the best! It has a sleek and modern design that blends well with any decor. It's small enough to fit in a corner of a room without being noticeable. It has a dual-side air intake system, that operates on both sides simultaneously. It's also very quiet so you can run all day and not be bothersome. Great Buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Considerable less dust
reviews.reviewText: We keep this on level 3 day and night. Living in Colorado is very dry and lots of dust. With dogs and everything else going on it keeps our room just perfect! It will sense even the humidifier running and tried to clean the air, sensor works really good! Doesn't take up much space and can be perfectly put off to the side. Perfect white noise if you have a hard time sleeping as well. Very happy with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Air purifier works amazing! It’s so quiet that sometimes I have to check if it’s running. I love that it is double sided filter for a rapid cleaner air. I would recommend this brand to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So quiet and efficient
reviews.reviewText: You won't even know that it is on! It is so quiet and I notice the air feeling cleaner. When I set it on auto and cook food that smokes/stinks it automatically turns the fan up to clean the air faster and slows down as the air is cleaner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fearers and a good price
reviews.reviewText: I bought a pair of these filters and couldn't be more pleased with the quality and features.The air quality sensor digital readout and visual indicators are very helpful and allow you to see how much PPM of pollution is in the air. The filter automatically revs up the speed if it senses a higher level of pollution and reduces speed when the readings return to a normal range.

This air purifier looks so nice in my house. It’s super sleek, looks even better in person, and I love the light up screen that shows the air quality. It’s super easy to set up and use. It’s also super quiet on the regular setting, it gets a little loud on 4x fan but I haven’t had any reason to put it on max - it works fast and I love it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Frische Luft und ruhige Nächte: Mein Erfahrungsbericht mit dem MORENTO HY4866 Luftreiniger
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Seit ich den Luftreiniger in meinem Zuhause installiert habe, hat sich die Luftqualität spürbar verbessert. Als jemand, der in einer Stadt wohnt und zudem Allergiker ist, war die Suche nach einem wirksamen Luftreiniger für mich essenziell. Dieses Gerät hat meine Erwartungen nicht nur erfüllt, sondern übertroffen.Die doppelseitige Luftzufuhr ist ein echtes Highlight. Mit zwei Lufteinlässen arbeitet der Reiniger unglaublich effizient und verbessert die Luftqualität in meinem großen Wohnzimmer erheblich schneller als erwartet. Die CADR von 300m³/h für Räume bis zu 100㎡ ist beeindruckend und macht ihn ideal für fast jede Raumgröße.Die hocheffiziente Filtrierung ist ein weiterer Punkt, der mich überzeugt hat. Der Luftreiniger entfernt zuverlässig 99,97% aller Partikel ab einer Größe von 0,3 Mikrometern. Das bedeutet, dass Staub, Rauch, Pollen und sogar Haustierhaare effektiv gefiltert werden. Für mich als Allergiker ist das ein Segen. Seitdem ich den Reiniger nutze, habe ich weniger Atembeschwerden und fühle mich generell wohler.Das PM2,5 Display und der Luftqualitätssensor sind sehr benutzerfreundlich. Es ist faszinierend zu sehen, wie der Reiniger die Luftqualität in Echtzeit überwacht und die Informationen direkt auf dem Bildschirm anzeigt. Der Auto-Modus, der sich automatisch an die Luftqualität anpasst, ist besonders praktisch. Wenn die Luftqualität sinkt, erhöht der Reiniger automatisch die Geschwindigkeit, um die Luft schneller zu reinigen.Ein weiterer großer Pluspunkt ist die leise Arbeitsweise des Luftreinigers. Im Ruhemodus ist das Gerät kaum hörbar, was besonders nachts ein großer Vorteil ist. Es beeinträchtigt meine Schlafqualität überhaupt nicht, was bei anderen Luftreinigern oft ein Problem ist.Die 4 einstellbaren Lüftergeschwindigkeiten und der praktische Timer-Modus runden das Gesamtpaket ab. Ich kann die Geschwindigkeit je nach Bedarf anpassen und den Timer für die Nacht oder wenn ich nicht zu Hause bin einstellen.

This air purifier is just what I was hoping for. It cleans and circulates the air very quickly and efficiently. It is priced well, sleek design, quiet, and we no longer have a build up of dust on everything. I am purchasing a second one today!
Habe den Lutreiniger vor ein paar Tagen erhalten. Ist sehr einfach in Betrieb zu nehmen, läuft ruhig und verströmt frische Luft! Klare Kaufempfehlung!
Quickly the home feels fresh. Air is clean and light. Quiet and easy to use. Great choice for condo living.
